Package space.sunqian.common.base.value

Interface ShortVar

All Superinterfaces:
PrimitiveToVal<Short>, PrimitiveToVar<Short,ShortVar>, ShortVal
public interface ShortVar extends ShortVal, PrimitiveToVar<Short,ShortVar>
Primitive short version of Var.
